name: WaxFusion Staked WAX
description: WaxFusion is an open-source liquid staking protocol on WAX Blockchain. When users deposit WAX into the protocol, they receive a liquid staked token called LSWAX. The funds deposited by users are used for staking, and CPU rentals; both of which result in a majority of earned WAX being shared with LSWAX holders. The protocol also incentivizes liquidity on WAX, by allocating a portion of earned rewards to LP farms once per week.
